resources.string: Indonesia is a country that is rich in tourism and also rich in culture....Across the equator, Indonesia has a tropical region that holds a lot of natural wealth. Not only the people are fascinated by the beauty of Indonesia, but the corners of the world are amazed at the beauty of Indonesia is natural wealth. No wonder that Indonesia is filled with foreign adventurers
“Everybody in this country should learn to program a computer, because it teaches you how to think.” \n ~ Steve Jobs ~
